title: Julian Nagelsmann - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2010, he began his coaching career as a youth coach at TSG Hoffenheim, eventually coaching their first team in 2015, where he led them to a third-place finish in the Bundesliga and Champions League qualification. He departed Hoffenheim in 2019 and was appointed at fellow Bundesliga club RB Leipzig, reaching the semi-finals of the UEFA Champions League in 2020. Nagelsmann was appointed by Bayern Munich in 2021 for a world record managerial transfer worth €25 million (£21.7 million), ...

title: Julian Nagelsmann: News & coaching profile - FC Bayern Munich
snippet: Julian Nagelsmann was born on 23 July 1987 and has been head coach at Bayern since July 2021. Info, honours and news here.

title: Julian Nagelsmann: 10 things on the coach hoping to lead Germany to FIFA World Cup success | Bundesliga
snippet: He's the youngest coach to reach the final four, surpassing Didier Deschamps' previous record of 35 years, and did so by knocking out Atletico Madrid and Diego Simeone, who made his senior debut as a player the year Nagelsmann was born.
